amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to allow the Drug Enforcement Administration and Federal Bureau of Investigation to enter into joint task forces with tribal and local law enforcement agencies.

vote.text: Amendment SA 651 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 651 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Hoeven. (consideration: CR 3/26/2015 S2014-2022; text: CR 3/26/2015 S2015) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to allow the Drug Enforcement Administration and Federal Bureau of Investigation to enter into joint task forces with tribal and local law enforcement agencies.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 651 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 651 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Hoeven.
